DOC.brief_summary: The objective SAMMPRIS-affiliated study understand mechanism mechanisms underlie ischemic stroke recurrence high-grade intracranial atherosclerotic disease order determine predictor recurrent stroke . MoSIS evaluate 6 specific mechanism stroke medically-treated SAMMPRIS cohort : decrease antegrade flow , progression stenosis , decrease proximal collateral flow , decrease distal collateral flow , impaired cerebrovascular reserve , artery-to-artery embolism .
